reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Providing the basic level of health services and increasing coordination between partners in the health sector.

description.narrative: Providing appropriate medical services and health care to Yemeni patients by supporting hospitals with equipment and equipment, providing operational budgets and training staff.

Supporting hospitals and medical centers with medical equipment, personal protection means, fuel, medicines and medical consumables, in addition to operational budgets, training medical personnel to provide medical services to citizens in the Republic of Yemen, in addition to strengthening coordination between partners in the health sector.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
